document_data.name: Donut
document_data.mainbody: '''Donuts''' or '''doughnuts''', were a type of sweet handfood [[bread]], virtually unknown in the Realms.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.Availability: In the city of [[Ravens Bluff]], doughnuts and other small handfood pastries were served in [[Chemcheaux]], a famous magic shop in the [[Ravens Bluff/Temple District|Temple District]]. The store offered several cauldrons of exotic hot [[tea]]s with a selection of doughnuts and other pastries for the guests to snack on.
